.hello.desc: A simple command that greats the user in one of many ways

.doyoulikeme?.desc: A command for testing the 'user' response type for custom commands that will come out with a preset response based on user id

userlist.name: Moose
userlist.response: Well...I don't really have a choice since you made me...

userlist.name: Spork
userlist.response: Oh I love Sonic the hedgehog:tm:!

.level.desc: A simple command that informs the user of their rank on the mee6 bot leaderboards
.level.response:
Here you are, {user.mention}! Remember that the messages are limited to once per minute to prevent spam :smile:
https://mee6.xyz/leaderboard/685766882275754162

.8ball.desc: The user asks a question to the bot and the bot will call upon the mystical forces to answer the users question as accurately as possible
.8ball.format:
.8ball [QUESTION]
Example: .8ball Do you like answering questions?
.8ball.error: Hmm...I think you need to ask me a question first :sweat_smile:

.ping.desc: Will respond to the user with the latency (ping) in milliseconds.

userlist.name: Moose
userlist.response:
Hey {user.mention}!
Do you have money? No? Then you should play ALBION ONLINE
https://albiononline.com/en/home
Get it now! - HEILONG
